question: What is the name of the third-generation Anti-Tank Guided Missile (ATGM), which was successfully tested in Pokhran?
explanation:
The third-generation Anti-Tank Guided Missile (ATGM), Nag, was successfully tested in Pokhran range in Thar desert, Rajasthan.
The missile would enter the production phase and then will be inducted into the Indian army. It will be produced by Bharat Dynamics Limited (BDL), a Defence PSU. Ordnance Factory, Medak, will produce the NAMICA (Nag Missile Carrier).
